/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the typical hues of a cityscape.
